parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Probably from a primary verb eiro; peace; by implication, prosperity.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To hide, conceal, lay up. A primary verb; to conceal.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
The eye; fig: the mind's eye. From optanomai; the eye; by implication, vision; figuratively, envy.
